cdi:
%%MANUFACTURER%% %%MODEL%% %%HARDWARE_VERSION%% %%SOFTWARE_VERSION%%
%%ACDI%%
DS64 Configuration
LocoNet Gateway %%LOCONET_GATEWAYS%%
Board ID 1 256
Write board ID to DS64
0Keep 1Write board ID to DS64
Read settings from DS64
0Keep 1Read settings from DS64
Reset to factory defaults
0Keep current settings 1Reset DS64 to factory defaults
Write changes to DS64 The changes that you have made will not become effective until they are written to the DS64.
0Do not write changes to DS64 1Write changes to DS64
Commands
Computer and/or Throttle Inputs
0The DS64 accepts both throttle and computer commands 1The DS64 accepts computer commands only
Power
Power Management Options for DS64 Outputs
0At power on, the DS64's 4 outputs power up to their last state 1At power on, the DS64's 4 outputs do not power up until they receive a command
Startup Delay The startup delay tells the DS64 to wait for a certain time after the layout is powered up before 'waking up'. This feature prevents multiple DS64s on your layout from powering up at the same instant and overwhelming your lay-outs power supply.
0The DS64's startup delay is 65ms times the address of switch 1 1The DS64's startup delay is 130ms times the address of switch 1
Static Time Out Length This sets the static timeout length for slow motion turnout operation.
0Outputs do not shut off 1Outputs shut off after 16 seconds
Outputs
Output Type
0Solenoid mode 1Slow motion mode
Solenoid Pulse Length/Crossing Gate Flashing Rate When in solenoid mode this defines the pulse length. When in slow motion mode this defines the timing of the crossing gate light flashing.
00 ms 1200 ms 1400 ms 1600 ms 1800 ms 11000 ms 11200 ms 11400 ms 11600 ms 11800 ms 12000 ms 12200 ms 12400 ms 12600 ms 12800 ms 13000 ms
Outputs Output
LocoNet Switch Address 1 2048
Thrown Event Enable
0Thrown event disabled 1Thrown event enabled
Thrown Event Id (C) When this event is received the output will be set to thrown.
Closed Event Enable
0Closed event disabled 1Closed event enabled
Closed Event Id (C) When this event is received the output will be set to closed.
Crossing Gate Feature When the crossing gate feature is enabled, a high on either of the A or S inputs related to this output will cause the output to blink at the defined rate.
0Crossing gate feature is disabled 1Crossing gate feature is enabled
Inputs
LocoNet Sensor Message Type
0General sensor reporting 1Turnout sensor state reporting
Input Sensor Configuration
0Configuration 1 1Configuration 2 2Configuration 3 3Configuration 4 4Configuration 5 5Configuration 6 6Configuration 7 7Configuration 8
Inputs Input
"A" Sensor Thrown Event Enable
0"A" sensor thrown event disabled 1"A" sensor thrown event enabled
"A" Sensor Thrown Event Id (P) This event will be sent when the "A" sensor is set to thrown.
"A" Sensor Closed Event Enable
0"A" sensor closed event disabled 1"A" sensor closed event enabled
"A" Sensor Closed Event Id (P) This event will be sent when the "A" sensor is set to closed.
"S" Sensor Thrown Event Enable
0"S" sensor thrown event disabled 1"S" sensor thrown event enabled
"S" Sensor Thrown Event Id (P) This event will be sent when the "S" sensor is set to thrown.
"S" Sensor Closed Event Enable
0"S" sensor closed event disabled 1"S" sensor closed event enabled
"S" Sensor Closed Event Id (P) This event will be sent when the "S" sensor is set to closed.
